name: @equistamp/equistamp
description: A TypeScript library for interacting with equistamp.com

scripts.build: cp packages/xapi/README.md ./ && yarn workspaces run build
scripts.lint: yarn workspaces run tsc && yarn prettier && npm run eslint
scripts.lint:fix: yarn workspaces run tsc && npm run prettier:fix && npm run eslint:fix
scripts.update-deps: cd packages/xapi && npm run update-deps && npm run lint:fix && cd ../.. && git add .
scripts.bump-patch: yarn workspaces run yarn version --no-git-tag-version --new-version patch && npm run update-deps && yarn version --new-version patch
scripts.bump-minor: yarn workspaces run yarn version --no-git-tag-version --new-version minor && npm run update-deps && yarn version --new-version minor
scripts.bump-major: yarn workspaces run yarn version --no-git-tag-version --new-version major && npm run update-deps && yarn version --new-version major

author: Equistamp
